File libsrc/libgobject/DataPoint.c

This structure is a reference to one data value of a TimeSeries. 
  typedef struct
  {
 	GObjectPart		core;
 
 	TimeSeries		timeSeries;
 	Segment			segment;
 	int			index;
 	int			segmentIndex;
 	char			label;
  } *DataPoint;

See Also:

Create a DataPoint.

Public Functions

new_DataPoint 
 DataPoint new_DataPoint(TimeSeries timeSeries,
                         Segment segment,
                         int index)
Create a DataPoint. A DataPoint is a reference to one data value of a Segment of a TimeSeries.

Parameters:
timeSeries - The TimeSeries that contains the data point.
segment - The Segment that contains the data point. Must be a segment contained in timeSeries.
index - The index of the data point in the segment. Must be >= 0 && < timeSeries->size.
DataPoint_data 
 float DataPoint_data(DataPoint dp)
Get the data value for this DataPoint.
DataPoint_time 
 double DataPoint_time(DataPoint dp)
Get the time of this DataPoint.
DataPoint_timeSeries 
 TimeSeries DataPoint_timeSeries(DataPoint dp)
Get the TimeSeries of this DataPoint.
DataPoint_segment 
 Segment DataPoint_segment(DataPoint dp)
Get the Segment of this DataPoint.
DataPoint_index 
 int DataPoint_index(DataPoint dp)
Get the index of this DataPoint.
DataPoint_segmentIndex 
 int DataPoint_segmentIndex(DataPoint dp)
Get the segmentIndex of this DataPoint.
